meanings.sent1: She was prettying her room by adding colorful curtains.
meanings.sent2: The florist was prettying up the shop with fresh flowers.
meanings.sent3: The little girl was prettying her doll with a tiny bow.
meanings.sent4: The artist was prettying the canvas with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The decorator was prettying the event venue with elegant decorations.

meanings.definition: The act of enhancing the appearance of something.
meanings.sent1: The prettying of the garden made it a beautiful spot.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the prettying of her outfits with accessories.
meanings.sent3: The prettying of the cake with icing was a delightful task.
meanings.sent4: The prettying of the room for the party was meticulous.
meanings.sent5: The prettying of the website design attracted more visitors.
